#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,count=0,s;
    unsigned long long int  a;
    cin>>t;
    while(t>=1)
    {
        cin>>a;
        while(a!=0)
        {
            s=a%10;
            if(s==0)
                count+=18;
            if(s==1)
                count+=4;
            if(s==2)
                count+=10;
            if(s==3)
                count+=10;
            if(s==4)
                count+=8;
            if(s==5)
                count+=10;
            if(s==6)
                count+=18;
            if(s==7)
                count+=9;
            if(s==8)
                count+=21;
            if(s==9)
            count+=18;

            a=a/10;


        }
        cout<<count<<"\n";
        count=0;
        t--;
}
    return 0;
}
